permissions.firefox_permission_denied: Rainbow needs permission to access all websites to work properly. Please grant permission in order to continue.

add_wallet.title: Add another wallet
add_wallet.create_wallet_description: Create a new wallet on one of your seed phrases.
add_wallet.import_wallet: Import with a Secret Recovery Phrase or Private Key
add_wallet.import_wallet_description: Add a wallet using your Secret Recovery Phrase or a Private Key.
add_wallet.hardware_wallet_description: Add more accounts from your hardware wallet.
add_wallet.watch_address_description: Watch a public address or ENS name.

remove_wallet_prompt.remove_last_wallet_title: Remove %{name} and your Secret Recovery Phrase
remove_wallet_prompt.remove_description: This will remove the wallet from this list and delete all data associated with it.
remove_wallet_prompt.remove_last_wallet_description: This will permanently delete your wallet and Secret Recovery Phrase and all associated data
remove_wallet_prompt.hide_description: This only removes the wallet from this list. You can find this wallet and additional management options in settings.

settings.title: Settings
settings.default_wallet_description: Allow apps to prioritize Rainbow when looking for an extension to connect with.

networks.title: Networks
networks.description: Choose which networks and tokens to display. You can connect to any networks supported by Rainbow, even if they’re unchecked.

developer_tools.title: Enable Developer Tools
developer_tools.toggle_explainer: Enables the Testnet Mode shortcut (T) and adds a toggle to the home screen’s top-right menu.

custom_rpc.title: Add Custom RPC
custom_rpc.cant_connect: Can't connect to this RPC endpoint
custom_rpc.rpc_not_responding: The provided RPC endpoint is not responding

privacy_and_security.title: Privacy & Security
privacy_and_security.analytics_description: Help Rainbow improve its products and services by allowing analytics of usage data. Collected data is not associated with you or your account.
privacy_and_security.hide_asset_balances_description: With this turned on Rainbow will obfuscate token balances accross the app.

private_key.title: Your Private Key
private_key.subtitle: Anyone who has this key can access your entire wallet! You should never share it.
private_key.warning_1: Never share your Private Key or enter it into any apps.
private_key.warning_2: Make sure nobody can view your screen when viewing your Private Key.
private_key.warning_3: Anyone with your Private Key can access your entire wallet.
private_key.warning_4: Rainbow Support will never ask you for your Private Key.

recovery_phrase.title: Your Secret Recovery Phrase
recovery_phrase.subtitle: Anyone who has these words can access your entire wallet! You should never share them.
recovery_phrase.warning_1: Never share your Secret Recovery Phrase or enter it into any apps.
recovery_phrase.warning_2: Make sure nobody can view your screen when viewing your Secret Recovery Phrase.
recovery_phrase.warning_3: Anyone with your Secret Recovery Phrase can access your entire wallet.
recovery_phrase.warning_4: Rainbow Support will never ask you for your Secret Recovery Phrase.

wipe_wallets.acknowlegement: I have read and acknowledge the above info.
wipe_wallets.warning_one: Resetting Rainbow will reset your password, & remove all wallets.
wipe_wallets.warning_two: This will also erase all data & settings in Rainbow.
wipe_wallets.warning_three: Ensure your Secret Recovery Phrase is secure before proceeding.
wipe_wallets.warning_four: Your assets & funds are accessible with the correct recovery information.
wipe_wallets.wipe_confirmation_desc: Are you sure you want to reset the Rainbow browser extension?

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.flashbots_description: Flashbots protects your transactions and reduces the likelihood of transaction failures.

search_tags.import_wallet: add, secret recovery, seed phrase, private key

developer_tools_toast.description_enabled: Press T to toggle Testnet Mode

add_wallet.search_placeholder: Search ways to add a wallet…

my_wallets.search_placeholder: Select a wallet to switch to…

quick_promo.text: Press %{modifierSymbol}K to open the Magic Menu

connected_apps.title: Connected Apps
connected_apps.no_connections_copy: Websites you connect to will show up here

token_approval.title: What’s an Approval?
token_approval.description_1: Approvals grant a dApp to spend and transfer tokens or NFTs on your behalf.
token_approval.description_2: It is important to monitor your approvals and revoke unnecessary, broad, or unsafe approvals that may risk your assets.

review.title: Review & Send
review.sending_on_l2_check_1: The address I’m sending to supports %{chainName}

tokens_input.nothing_found_description: Some tokens don’t have enough liquidity to perform a successful %{action}.
tokens_input.nothing_found_description_l2: Some tokens don’t have enough layer 2 liquidity to perform a successful %{action}.

slippage.title: Slippage
slippage.description_1: Slippage occurs when the price of a %{action} changes during the time between you submitting your transaction and its confirmation.
slippage.description_2: Setting a higher slippage tolerance increases the likelihood your %{action} will be successful, but may result in you getting a worse price.

read_more.close_text: about slippage and how it affects %{actions}.

flashbots.title: Flashbots
flashbots.description: Flashbots protects your transactions from frontrunning and sandwich attacks which might result in you getting a worse price or your transaction failing.

read_more.close_text: about Flashbots and the protection it offers.

routing.title: %{Action} Routing
routing.description: By default, Rainbow chooses the cheapest route possible for your %{action}. If you prefer to specifically use either 0x or 1inch, you can do that too.

long_wait.title: Long wait to %{action}
long_wait.description: This %{action} may take a very long time to complete. This is usually due to problems with a cross-chain bridge.

no_route.title: No routes found
no_route.description: We couldn’t find a route for this %{action}. A route may not exist for this %{action}, or the amount may be too small.

no_quote.title: No quote available
no_quote.description: We couldn’t find quotes for this %{action}. This could be because there isn’t enough liqudity to %{action} or because of problems with how the  token is implemented.

insufficient_liquidity.title: Insufficient liquidity
insufficient_liquidity.description: We couldn’t find quotes for this %{action} because this pair doesn’t have enough liquidity on exchanges.

fee_on_transfer_token.title: Fee on Transfer Token
fee_on_transfer_token.description: This %{action} will fail in Rainbow because the %{tokenName} contract adds extra fees.

flashbots.title: Flashbots
flashbots.description: Flashbots protects your transactions from frontrunning and sandwich attacks which might result in you getting a worse price or your transaction failing.

fee.title: Rainbow Fee
fee.description: Rainbow takes a %{feePercentage} fee from %{actions}. It’s part of what enables us to give you the best Ethereum experience possible.

contacts.remove_contact_description: Are you sure you want to remove “%{name}” from your contacts?

unlock.enter_password: Enter your password to unlock Rainbow.

onboard_before_connect.almost_done: You’re almost done. Quickly finish setting up your wallet with Rainbow.

welcome.title: Rainbow
welcome.subtitle: Explore the new world of Ethereum
welcome.disclaimer_tos: By proceeding, you agree to Rainbow’s

seed_backup_prompt.title: Before you get started, backup your Secret Recovery Phrase
seed_backup_prompt.warning_1: It's important to write down and store your Secret Recovery Phrase somewhere safe.
seed_backup_prompt.warning_2: Your Secret Recovery Phrase is the only way to recover your accounts and funds.
seed_backup_prompt.warning_3: Anyone with your Secret Recovery Phrase can access your entire wallet.

seed_reveal.title: Your Secret Recovery Phrase
seed_reveal.write_down_seed_importance: Anyone who has these words can access your entire wallet! You should never share them.

import_wallet_via_secret.title: Import Wallet
import_wallet_via_secret.explanation: Select an import method that suites you best. You may import additional wallets later at any time.
import_wallet_via_secret.seed_phrase: Import from a Secret Recovery Phrase
import_wallet_via_secret.seed_phrase_desc: Add a wallet group using your 12 or 24 word Secret Recovery Phrase
import_wallet_via_secret.private_key_desc: Add a single wallet using your 64-character Private Key

import_wallet_via_seed.title: Import Your Wallet
import_wallet_via_seed.explanation: To add a wallet, enter or paste your 12 or 24 word Secret Recovery Phrase.
import_wallet_via_seed.n_words_might_be_wrong: %{n} words may be misspelled or incorrect.
import_wallet_via_seed.1_word_might_be_wrong: 1 word may be misspelled or incorrect.
import_wallet_via_seed.couldnt_paste: We couldn’t paste your Secret Recovery Phrase

import_wallet_via_private_key.title: Import Your Wallet
import_wallet_via_private_key.explanation: Enter your 64-character Private Key from Rainbow or any Ethereum wallet.
import_wallet_via_private_key.placeholder: Paste your Private Key from another wallet

import_or_connect.title: Restore or Connect
import_or_connect.explanation: Anyone with your Secret Recovery Phrase can access your entire wallet! Store it somewhere safe and don't share it with anyone.
import_or_connect.import_wallet: Import with a Secret Recovery Phrase or Private Key
import_or_connect.import_wallet_description: Add a wallet using your Secret Recovery Phrase or a Private Key.
import_or_connect.connect_wallet_description: Add accounts from your hardware wallet.
import_or_connect.watch_address_description: Watch a public address or ENS name.

import_wallet_selection.title: Your wallets

description.zero: Rainbow detected 1 wallet. You can add more at any time.
description.one: Rainbow detected 1 wallet that have been used recently. You can add more at any time.
description.other: Rainbow detected %{count} wallets that have been used recently. You can edit or add more at any time.

import_wallet_selection.loading: Hold tight while we look up all your wallets...

watch_wallet.title: Watch an Ethereum address
watch_wallet.description: Enter any Ethereum address or ENS name. You'll have to import it later to send or sign transactions.
watch_wallet.loading: Hold tight while we start watching these wallets...

import_wallet.title: Import your wallet
import_wallet.description: Enter your Secret Recovery Phrase or a Private Key from Rainbow or any Ethereum wallet.
import_wallet.placeholder: Paste your Secret Recovery Phrase or a Private Key from another wallet

seed_verify.title: Verify your Secret Recovery Phrase
seed_verify.explanation: Select the 4th, 8th, and 12th words in the order your Secret Recovery Phrase displays them.

testnet_mode_watcher.testnet_mode_active: is currently active. Would you like to disable it and interact with %{chainName} instead?

sheet.allow_to: Allow %{appName} to view your wallet address, balance, activity and request approval for transactions.

wallet_backup_reminder.title: Some of your wallets aren’t backed up
wallet_backup_reminder.description: Some of your wallets aren’t backed up. Back up so you can regain access to your wallets if you lose access to this device.

approve_request.wallet_info_title: wants to connect to your wallet
approve_request.wallet_info_description: Allow %{appName} to view your wallets address, balance, activity and request approval for transactions.
approve_request.add_chain_info_description: If you approve it, this network could be used within the Rainbow Browser Extension.
approve_request.watch_asset_info_description: If you approve it, this asset could be used within the Rainbow Browser Extension.

malicious_warning.title: This app is likely malicious
malicious_warning.message: Signing messages or transactions from this app could result in losing your assets

malicious_transaction_warning.title: This transaction looks suspicious
malicious_transaction_warning.malicious_address: A malicious address is involved in this transaction. Signing may result in losses
malicious_transaction_warning.malicious_entity: A malicious entity is involved in this transaction. Signing may result in losses
malicious_transaction_warning.minting_is_a_losing_trade: A scam contract is involved in this transaction. Minting is a losing trade
malicious_transaction_warning.you_can_lose_everything: Signing this transaction could result in losing access to everything in your wallet

approve_request.insufficient_gas_funds_description: You need a bit more %{token} to pay for this transaction. Get more below to continue with this request.
approve_request.no_gas_funds_description: You’ll need %{token} to pay for this transaction. Get some %{token} below to continue with this request.
approve_request.bridge_and_try_again: Bridge some gas funds and try again
approve_request.buy_and_try_again: Buy some gas funds and try again

errors.error_encountered: Something went wrong. Please share the issue with our team and we'll get that fixed!

passwords.try_another_password_weak: This is a weak password that is easy to crack. Try a stronger password.
passwords.try_another_password_common: Make your password even stronger by mixing uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers and symbols.
passwords.too_short: Password needs to be at least 8 chars long

create_password.title: Create your password
create_password.description: Choose a password to secure & lock your wallet.

activity.empty_description: Once you start using your wallet, you will see your transactions here.

tokens_tab.coinbase_description: Transfer your crypto from Coinbase for free
tokens_tab.buy_title: Buy crypto to fund your wallet

explainer.floor_price_description: A collection's floor price is the lowest asking price across all the items currently for sale in a collection.

points.check_back_soon_description:
Points are currently unavailable.
Check back soon to continue using Rainbow Points.
points.referral_code_description: Earn points for referring friends once they swap $100 through Rainbow
points.description: Points are here. Find out how many you’ve been awarded.
points.referral_description: Enter a referral code below to claim your bonus reward.

onboarding.claim_description_buy: To claim the rest of your bonus points, get some ETH through Rainbow.
onboarding.claim_description_swap: To claim the rest of your bonus points, swap at least $100 through Rainbow.
onboarding.share_and_earn: Tweet your referral link and get an extra 250 points
onboarding.plus_percent_of_refers: Plus you’ll earn 10% of the points earned by anyone you refer
onboarding.share_tweet_with_metamask_bonus:
I just had %{points} Rainbow Points dropped into my wallet — and an extra %{metamaskBonus} Points as a bonus for migrating my MetaMask wallet into Rainbow 🦊 🔫

Everybody has at least 100 points waiting for them, but you might have more! Claim your drop: https://rainbow.me/points?ref=%{referralCode}
onboarding.keep_earning_by: Keep earning points by swapping, bridging, minting, referring friends, and more
onboarding.the_more_you_use: The more you use Rainbow, the more you’ll be rewarded
onboarding.ensure_you_have_a_balance_on: To continue, ensure you have an ETH balance on one of the following networks:
onboarding.or_alternatively_balance_on: Or alternatively, a MATIC balance on Polygon or a BNB balance on BSC

error.unexpected: Something unexpected happened, try again in a few minutes

speed_up_and_cancel.cancel_explanation: This will attempt to cancel your pending transaction. It requires broadcasting another transaction.
speed_up_and_cancel.speed_up_explanation: This will speed up your pending transaction by replacing it. There's a chance your original transaction will confirm first.

market_cap_explainer.title: Market Cap
market_cap_explainer.description: A market cap is the total market value of a token's circulating supply. It is calculated with an average exchange price.

fully_diluted_explainer.title: Fully Diluted Market Cap
fully_diluted_explainer.description: The maximum possible market cap of a token if the total supply was available in circulation.

wallet_ready.title: Rainbow is ready to use
wallet_ready.subtitle: To access your wallet, just click Rainbow from the Extensions drop-down, or use the speedy keyboard shortcut
wallet_ready.get_started_with_rainbow_desc: Welcome to Rainbow! We're so glad you're here. We’ve created this guide to help with the basics of Rainbow.
wallet_ready.discover_shortcuts_desc: Looking to discover more shortcuts? Check out this helpful guide we’ve put together for you.

arbitrum.title: What's Arbitrum?
arbitrum.description_1: Arbitrum is a Layer 2 network that runs on top of Ethereum, enabling cheaper and faster transactions while still benefiting from the underlying security of Ethereum.
arbitrum.description_2: It bundles lots of transactions together in a "roll up" before sending them down to live permanently on Ethereum.

optimism.title: What's Optimism?
optimism.description_1: Optimism is a Layer 2 network that runs on top of Ethereum, enabling cheaper and faster transactions while still benefiting from the underlying security of Ethereum.
optimism.description_2: It bundles lots of transactions together in a "roll up" before sending them down to live permanently on Ethereum.

polygon.title: What's Polygon?
polygon.description_1: Polygon is a sidechain, a distinct network that runs alongside Ethereum and is compatible with it.
polygon.description_2: It allows for cheaper and faster transactions, but unlike Layer 2 networks, Polygon has its own security and consensus mechanisms that differ from Ethereum.

bsc.title: What's BSC?
bsc.description_1: Binance Smart Chain, or BSC for short, is the blockchain network for the trading platform Binance.
bsc.description_2: It allows for cheaper and faster transactions, but unlike Layer 2 networks, BSC has its own security and consensus mechanisms that differ from Ethereum.

base.title: What's Base?
base.description_1: Base is a Layer 2 network that runs on top of Ethereum, enabling cheaper and faster transactions while still benefiting from the underlying security of Ethereum.
base.description_2: It bundles lots of transactions together in a "roll up" before sending them down to live permanently on Ethereum.

zora.title: What's Zora?
zora.description_1: Zora is a Layer 2 network that runs on top of Ethereum, enabling cheaper and faster transactions while still benefiting from the underlying security of Ethereum.
zora.description_2: It bundles lots of transactions together in a "roll up" before sending them down to live permanently on Ethereum.

to_smart_contract.description_1: The address you entered is for a smart contract.
to_smart_contract.description_2: Except for rare situations, you probably shouldn't do this. You could lose your assets or they might go to the wrong place.
to_smart_contract.description_3: Double check the address, verify it with the recipient, or contact support first.
to_smart_contract.title: Hold your horses!

custom_gas.current_base_stable: Network traffic is stable right now. Have fun!
custom_gas.current_base_surging: Fees are unusually high right now! Unless your transaction is urgent, it’s best to wait for fees to drop.
custom_gas.current_base_rising: Fees are rising right now! It’s best to use a higher max base fee to avoid a stuck transaction.
custom_gas.current_base_description: The base fee is set by the Ethereum network and changes depending on how busy the network is.
custom_gas.max_base_explainer_1: This is the maximum base fee you’re willing to pay for this transaction.
custom_gas.max_base_explainer_2: Setting a higher max base fee prevents your transaction from getting stuck if fees rise.
custom_gas.max_priority_explainer:
The miner tip goes directly to the miner who confirms your transaction on the network.

A higher tip makes your transaction more likely to be confirmed quickly.

alert.wallet_watching_mode: This wallet is currently Watched. Import the Secret Recovery Phrase, Private Key, or pair your device.
alert.wallet_testing_mode: Testnets are not supported by Swap. Disable Testnet Mode to continue.
alert.no_hw_ff: Hardware wallets are not supported on Firefox. Try a different browser like Chrome or Brave.

hw.ledger_support: Supports Ledger Nano S, Nano S Plus, Nano X, and Stax devices.
hw.trezor_support: Supports Model One or Model T devices.
hw.connect_ledger_description: Connect your Ledger to Rainbow by plugging it into your computer using the USB-C cable.
hw.unlock_ledger_description: The Ethereum app needs to be open on your Ledger to continue.
hw.unlock_ledger_description_2: Enter your passcode to unlock your Ledger. Once unlocked, open the Ethereum app by pressing both buttons at once.
hw.exclusivity_ledger_title: Looks like another app is using your Ledger
hw.exclusivity_ledger_description: Make sure you're not using your device with another app like Ledger Live, MetaMask or another browser tab.
hw.exclusivity_ledger_description_2: Once you close the other app, please reload this page to try again.
hw.needs_app_ledger_description: The Ethereum app needs to be open on your Ledger to proced with the transaction.
hw.needs_app_ledger_description_2: Enter your passcode to unlock your Ledger. Once unlocked, open the Ethereum app by pressing both buttons at once.
hw.connect_trezor_description: Continue to connect your Trezor to Rainbow through the web interface.
hw.connect_wallets_found: We’ve found %{count} wallets on your %{vendor} with a balance or activity. Select which to connect.
hw.connect_wallets_not_found: We didn't find any wallets with activity on this %{vendor} but you can still add these.
hw.connection_successful_description: You’ve successfully added %{count} %{wallet_noun}. %{wallet_pronoun} easy to identify in your wallet list with the %{vendor} badge. You can add more at any time.
hw.add_by_index_title: Add a wallet by its index
hw.add_by_index_description: Select the derivation path and enter the index of the wallet you would like to add.
hw.continue_on_trezor_connect: Please follow the instructions on the Trezor Connect window
hw.ledger_locked_error: Please make sure your ledger is unlocked and open the Ethereum app
hw.check_ledger_disconnected: Make sure your device is connected, unlocked and the ethereum app is open

choose_wallet_group.title: Choose wallet group
choose_wallet_group.description: Choose the wallet group you'd like to create a new wallet within, or create a new one

unsupported_browser.title: Unsupported Browser
unsupported_browser.description: Your browser is not currently supported. Rainbow is currently available for Android and iOS on mobile, and Chrome, Brave, Arc, and Edge on desktop devices.

watch_asset.not_found: We couldn't find this asset on the selected network. Please choose the right network below
